statement: Evidence flow is not fully wired end-to-end because search results are not persisted to the evidences table and stage completion does not advance/enqueue subsequent stages.
rationale: Window orchestration only operates over existing evidences and applyRequestResult updates per-evidence columns but does not advance the window or enqueue the next stage; runWindowSearch returns results without insertion.
keyAssumptions: No other hidden ingestion/stage-advancement mutations exist
Window processing should be stage-sequential without manual intervention
validationCriteria: Add an ingestion mutation that inserts evidences with l0_raw_content
Add stage completion logic that moves windows to next stage and enqueues
Evidence flow can be tested by creating a window, ingesting, and observing l1->l3 completion
critiquePoints: Ingestion/stage transitions might be implemented in other branch code or planned elsewhere
The system may intentionally rely on external orchestration rather than automatic stage chaining
questions: Where should stage progression live: window_service, orchestrator, or scheduler?
Should stage progression be per-evidence or per-window completion?
